channel.title: Google Bans Use of Windows Internally
channel.description:
http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?f=/g/a/2010/05/31/businessinsider-henry-blodget-google-dumping-microsoft-windows-company-wide-blames-windows-for-china-hacking-attack-2010-5.DTL
Employee's are now being given the choice of OSX and Linux, citing security as the reason they are moving away from windows.
Keep in mind I have yet to find a completely reputable article, and most of them appear to be full of fairly shitty journalism. I somehow think Google would be able to figure out how to upgrade from IE6 to prevent such nasty exploits in the future, so that can't be the sole reason to ditch windows. Fairly interesting none the less.
